There is your problem!  When you try to access a computer using the WAN (public) IP, the router doesn't know which computer to forward the request to.

There are two solutions.  1) Connect using your LAN IP (the one starting with 192.168), or 2) Set up port forwarding on your router.  Since you are just testing, 1 is --  ah.
